meanings.definition: An act or instance of making or becoming open.
meanings.sent1: The opening of the door allowed fresh air to come in.
meanings.sent2: She used a can opener to create an opening in the lid.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved an unexpected opening in the box.
meanings.sent4: The opening of the flower petals revealed a hidden treasure inside.
meanings.sent5: The opening of the curtains signaled the start of the show.

meanings.definition: A vacant or unobstructed space or place.
meanings.sent1: The opening in the fence was big enough for the cat to slip through.
meanings.sent2: The cave had a narrow opening that led to a vast chamber.
meanings.sent3: The opening in the schedule allowed for a quick nap in the afternoon.
meanings.sent4: The opening in the clouds revealed a patch of blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The opening in the wall was covered by a painting.

meanings.sent1: The opening of the book set the stage for the adventure to come.
meanings.sent2: In the opening of the movie, the main character is introduced.
meanings.sent3: The opening of the race had everyone excited and ready to run.
meanings.sent4: The opening of the concert was met with thunderous applause.
meanings.sent5: The opening of the meeting covered the agenda for the day.
